message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"body; a person's physical body or health","sentence":"她的身体很好。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a smiling girl (simple, friendly style) standing strong and healthy, with a faint stylized glow around her body to express good health.
